content:
# The stone furnace has successfully produced a total of 31 iron plates while consuming 11 coal. It currently has 4 iron ore remaining.
# 
# With 31 iron plates now available, I can finally proceed to craft the Iron Gear Wheels and the Assembling Machine, as I have more than enough resources to do so.
# 
# However, I need to remember that I cannot craft Iron Gear Wheels without an Assembling Machine. Thus, I will use some of the iron plates to craft the Assembling Machine first.

# I will now proceed to craft the Assembling Machine using 3 iron plates.

craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1)  # Crafting an Assembling Machine 1 using 3 iron plates.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking updated inventory after crafting.
